description.description: Describe a model, listing its properties.

create.description: Add a new instance of the model to storage.

read.description: Returns the properties of the matching model.

read_all.description: Returns the properties of the matching model.

update.description: Updates a model instance by supplying new properties and the id of the model to update.

delete.description: Deletes a model instance by supplying an id of the mode.
